name: symbols-mcp
description: AI-powered assistant for the Symbols design-system framework. Generates DOMQL v3 components, pages, and full projects; converts React/Angular/Vue code to Symbols; searches Symbols documentation; and provides comprehensive framework reference.
author: baronsilver

tools.name: generate_component
tools.description: Generate a Symbols/DOMQL v3 component from a natural-language description

tools.name: generate_page
tools.description: Generate a Symbols/DOMQL v3 page with routing support

tools.name: generate_project
tools.description: Generate a complete multi-file Symbols/DOMQL v3 project structure

tools.name: convert_to_symbols
tools.description: Convert React, Angular, Vue, or HTML code to Symbols/DOMQL v3 format

tools.name: search_symbols_docs
tools.description: Search the Symbols documentation knowledge base for relevant information

tools.name: explain_symbols_concept
tools.description: Explain a Symbols/DOMQL concept with examples (state, routing, events, design tokens, etc.)

tools.name: review_symbols_code
tools.description: Review Symbols/DOMQL code for correctness, best practices, and v3 compliance

tools.name: create_design_system
tools.description: Generate Symbols design system files (colors, spacing, typography, theme, icons)
